pr_title: Add iceberg to product tests suite

timeline.bodyText: It would be nice to have some generic connector tests, that we could run for hive and iceberg (and potentially for other connectors too in future).
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: The scope of the PR is to add iceberg connector to the product tests, so I limited scope of iceberg tests to a bare minimum (create/delete table and run simple query). I propose deferring generalization between hive and iceberg tests and extending iceberg tests scope to be on par with hive tests to a follow up PRs.
replies.author: vrozov

timeline.message: Add iceberg to product tests suite
Temporarily exclude iceberg from Kerberos product tests
Temporarily exclude iceberg from Kerberos product tests

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer to not to configure iceberg connector in environments where it does not work. That would be very misleading to other developers, where they would think where something just got broken because it does not work but it is committed.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: IMO, there is a difference between committing broken functionality and providing a test environment that demonstrates that the functionality of a plugin is broken in certain configurations.
replies.author: vrozov
